name: R0bits
description:
Welcome to R0bits! The colony making robit game! This game has you building mines and defenses against aliens on a hostile planet!

Controls: 

  • WASD = Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Left Click - Beam
  • R - Research Menu
  • B - Build Menu
  • Delete - Delete Mode
  • Tab to switch Build tabs

Credit:

  • Main menu music - PetterTheSturgeon - Sci-fi Electronic Lost Signal https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-electronic-lost-signal
  • World music - Type 42 - Ascendance https://opengameart.org/content/ascendance-electronic-soundtrack
  • Art - Ceramic Skin Studios - https://deviantart.com/ceramicskinstudios

This game was made for JamCraft 4. Please enjoy it.
